name: Getting a Cup of Coffee with an Old Friend
name_original: Getting a Cup of Coffee with an Old Friend
description: In this choose-your-own-adventure narrative game, you play as Emily Fiorelli, a woman who has come back to her home town after losing the love of her life. Her mission is simple: to meet her old friend, Gladys Vries, for a cup of coffee. What could possibly be wrong with that? Emily is intent on pulling at a thread and won't stop until she gets answers. Play through the coffee date, with three distinct endings, and branching paths to get there.
